data.name: StringCMDBuildDescription
data.value: build the localized intellisense file.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionContentCompareDescription
data.value: set the content compare type.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionLocaleDescription
data.value: select locale. eg: "zh-cn". use the system culture info default.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionMonikerDescription
data.value: select .net moniker. eg: "net6.0". default is all of installed framework.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionNoCacheDescription
data.value: set not use existed local page cache.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionOutputDescription
data.value: set the output path.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionPackDescription
data.value: select application pack. eg: "Microsoft.AspNetCore.App". process all pack default..

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionParallelCountDescription
data.value: set the parallel process count. large value wiil let MS block your ip fast.

data.name: StringCMDBuildOptionSeparateLineDescription
data.value: the separate line between origin and locale content. (effective only use bilingual comparison)

data.name: StringCMDCleanDescription
data.value: clean the dangling ref folders.

data.name: StringCMDClearDescription
data.value: clear the download or cache files.

data.name: StringCMDInstallAutoInstallDescription
data.value: try install the localized IntelliSense archive from GitHub.

data.name: StringCMDInstallAutoOptionMonikerDescription
data.value: select .net moniker. eg: "net6.0". default is the installed latest version.

data.name: StringCMDInstallDescription
data.value: install the localized intellisense file. (copy all .xml file from source directory to target SDK pack directory)

data.name: StringCMDInstallOptionLocaleDescription
data.value: select locale. eg: "zh-cn". copy all default.

data.name: StringCMDInstallOptionSourceDescription
data.value: set the install source file(local or http url).

data.name: StringCMDInstallOptionTargetDescription
data.value: set the install target sdk directory.

data.name: StringCMDLoadArgumentSourceDescription
data.value: load archive package source file.

data.name: StringCMDLoadDescription
data.value: load the localized intellisense file archive package.

data.name: StringCMDLoadGithubDescription
data.value: load the localized intellisense file archive package from github (if existed).

data.name: StringCMDLoadOptionTargetDescription
data.value: archive package extract target path.

data.name: StringCMDShowDescription
data.value: query and show more installed SDK info.

data.name: StringCMDShowOptionMonikerDescription
data.value: a regex string for filter .net moniker in result.

data.name: StringCMDShowOptionPackDescription
data.value: a regex string for filter application pack name in result.

data.name: StringCMDShowPackRefsDescription
data.value: list all installed SDK‘s pack refs file.

data.name: StringCMDShowPacksDescription
data.value: list all installed SDK‘s pack.

data.name: StringCMDUnInstallArgumentLocaleDescription
data.value: select locale. eg: "zh-cn".

data.name: StringCMDUnInstallArgumentMonikerDescription
data.value: set the framework moniker. eg: "net6.0"

data.name: StringCMDUnInstallDescription
data.value: uninstall the localized intellisense file.

data.name: StringCMDUnInstallOptionTargetDescription
data.value: set the uninstall target sdk directory.

data.name: StringOptionFilterDescription
data.value: a regex string for filter result.

data.name: StringOptionLogLevelDescription
data.value: set the log level from 0 - 5 .

data.name: StringRootCommandDescription
data.value: a tool to build and install localize intelliSense file eg: show Microsoft.NETCore.App for net6.0 contains 'threading' xml files: .\islocalizer show refs -p Microsoft.NETCore.App -m net6.0 -f threading build Microsoft.AspNetCore.App for net6.0 's localize intelliSense file: .\islocalizer build -p Microsoft.AspNetCore.App -m net6.0 install the builded files (may need run as administrator): .\islocalizer install clear the build caches: .\islocalizer clear cache
